Events that occurred on 11 April.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1953 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 137.
1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 189.
2006 - Fellowship!, an independent musical parody of The Lord of the Rings, wins the LA Weekly Theater Award for Musical of the Year.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 2510:
Eorl the Young and the Éothéod travel towards the Field of Celebrant.
